original_text: And the people of Nineveh believed God. They called for a fast and put on sackcloth, from the greatest of them to the least of them.
korean_text: 니느웨 사람들이 하나님을 믿고 금식을 선포하고 높고 낮은 자를 막론하고 굵은 베 옷을 입은지라

sentences.original_text: And the people of Nineveh believed God.
from the greatest of them to the least of them.
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 자부터 작은 자까지 모두 그렇게 했습니다.
